content.question: Which of the following transport mechanisms will be affected most directly by a temporary shortage of <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> molecules inside the cell?

choices.label: The movement of water molecules through aquaporins
The diffusion of oxygen molecules across the plasma membrane
The transport of glucose molecules against a concentration gradient

The facilitated diffusion of <math alttext="C a with a positive 2 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Ca</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> ions into the cell

content.answer: The transport of glucose molecules against a concentration gradient

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
